akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 104–66, title I, § 1051(n), Dec. 21, 1995, 109 Stat. 717

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 9311. Repealed. Pub. L. 104–66, title I, § 1051(n), Dec. 21, 1995, 109 Stat. 717
Section, Pub. L. 96–386, § 12, Oct. 7, 1980, 94 Stat. 1544, directed Secretary of Energy to submit annual report of activities pursuant to this chapter as a separate part of the annual report submitted pursuant to section 7321 of this title.
